attributes.action: Increase the Council Tax discount from 25% to 50% for OAPs living on their own
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Senior Citizens who have lost their partner are having to pay 75% of the council tax. Apart from the financial implications, they are usualy unable to participate in local amenities due to health and other restrictions so why must they pay MORE per head than any other citizen.
